modnlp.tc.parser
Class Parser

java.lang.Object
  modnlp.tc.parser.Parser
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmailParser, LingspamEmailParser, NewsParser
public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the most basic functionality of a tc.parser object: read the content of a file, assign it a category and a unique ID. This class will tipically be extended, and the parse() method will tipically b overridden.

See Also:
NewsParser, LingspamEmailParser

Constructor Summary
Parser()
          Create a new Parser instance.
 
Method Summary
 ParsedCorpus getParsedCorpus()
          Get parsed corpus, parsing filename if necessary
 void parse()
          Process ('parse') input file filename and add its contents literally to parsedCorpus wih ID and category = filename.
 void setFilename(java.lang.String fn)
          Set name of file to be parsed
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Parser

public Parser()
Create a new Parser instance. This will usually be followed by a call to setFilename(). This constructor takes no parameters so that the class can be loaded and instantiated dynamically (as a plugin) by MakeProbabilityModel etc.

See Also:
MakeProbabilityModel
Method Detail

setFilename

public void setFilename(java.lang.String fn)
Set name of file to be parsed

getParsedCorpus

public ParsedCorpus getParsedCorpus()
Get parsed corpus, parsing filename if necessary

parse

public void parse()
Process ('parse') input file filename and add its contents literally to parsedCorpus wih ID and category = filename. This method isn't likely to be very useful, so subclasses will tipically override it (e.g. NewsParser).

See Also:
NewsParser
